MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL24 and LL25 postcode area of Betws-Y-Coed and Dolwyddelan,, affecting properties in the surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of multiple faults located on a section of the network and the complexity of the repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.13PM on 25th October 2020.
